text: In Python 3.6, it seems we can now use annotations for variables. We should think if we can use the annotations for improving the inference, as long as the annotations respect a standard we can understand, such as PEP 484.
title: Use PEP 484 variable annotations for inference?
clean_text: In python 36 seem use annot variabl We think use annot improv infer long annot respect standard understand pep 484
